step1.title: Describe your idea
step1.description: Simply enter what you want to create: an image, text, code... Add constraints if needed.

step2.title: AI generates your prompt
step2.description: Our AI analyzes your request and creates a detailed, structured, optimized prompt for the best results.

step3.title: Copy and use
step3.description: Copy your prompt with one click and use it in ChatGPT, Midjourney, DALL-E or any other AI.

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Promptor.

q1.question: What is a prompt?
q1.answer: A prompt is a text instruction given to a generative AI to get a specific result. The more detailed and well-structured the prompt, the better the results generated by the AI.

q2.question: Which AI models are supported?
q2.answer: Prompts generated by Promptor are optimized for all generative AI models: ChatGPT, GPT-4, Claude, Midjourney, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, and many others.

q3.question: Is the free plan really free?
q3.answer: Yes! The free plan lets you generate 10 prompts per month with no commitment and no credit card. Perfect for testing the service and seeing if it works for you.

q4.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
q4.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

q5.question: Are my prompts private?
q5.answer: Yes, all your prompts are private and secure. We never share your data with third parties and you can delete your prompts at any time.

q6.question: How does multilingual generation work?
q6.answer: You can generate prompts in 13 different languages. Simply select your desired language and our AI will adapt the prompt accordingly.

testimonials.title: What our
testimonials.description: Join thousands of users who transform their ideas into professional prompts.
testimonials.testimonial1: Promptor has completely changed the way I work with AI. I save so much time and my results are much better!
testimonials.testimonial2: As a marketer, I need to create content every day. Promptor allows me to generate optimized prompts in seconds.
testimonials.testimonial3: Intuitive interface, exceptional results. I recommend Promptor to all my designer colleagues!
testimonials.testimonial4: The AI suggestions are incredible. They help me structure my prompts professionally even for complex tasks.
testimonials.testimonial5: I use Promptor daily to manage my social media. It has become an essential tool in my workflow.
testimonials.testimonial6: Multilingual generation is perfect for my international projects. A considerable time saver!

credits.title: Buy Credits
credits.subtitle: Choose the pack that fits your needs. The more you buy, the more you save!

securePayment.title: Secure Payment
securePayment.description: Transactions protected by FedaPay. Credit card and Mobile Money accepted.

instantAdd.title: Instant Addition
instantAdd.description: Your credits are added immediately after payment. Start right away!

noExpiration.title: No Expiration
noExpiration.description: Your credits never expire. Use them when you want, at your own pace.

freeBonus.title: Free Bonuses
freeBonus.description: Each pack includes free bonus credits. The more you buy, the more you earn!

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: Each action (prompt generation, improvement, etc.) consumes a certain number of credits based on complexity.

creditsExpire.question: Do credits expire?
creditsExpire.answer: No! Your credits are valid for life and never expire.

whatIsTier.question: What is a tier?
whatIsTier.answer: Tiers give you access to more features. The more you spend, the higher your tier automatically increases.

promoCode.question: Can I use a promo code?
promoCode.answer: Yes! Enter your promo code during purchase to get discounts or bonus credits.

proTip.title: Pro Tip
proTip.description: The larger the pack, the better the price per credit. Higher packs offer the best bonuses and unlock higher tiers!

cta.title: Ready to boost your creativity?
